articles.title: Fallout Season 1 Is Streaming Free On YouTube This Week
articles.title_tr: Fallout Season 1 Is Streaming Free On YouTube This Week
articles.summary: The first season of Prime Video's Fallout TV series will air for free on YouTube starting today, January 28.Prime Video and YouTube have announced a partnership to bring all eight episode of the first season to users. Presumably there will be ad breaks, but people with YouTube Premium may not get those. The first episode goes live today, January 28, at 5 PM PT / 8 PM ET, with Episode 2 arriving an hour later.          Two episodes will be released on YouTube daily through January 31. You can see the full schedule below.Continue Reading at GameSpot

articles.title: Dead By Daylight Is Getting A Balatro Crossover Featuring (A) Joker
articles.title_tr: Dead By Daylight Is Getting A Balatro Crossover Featuring (A) Joker
articles.summary: In February 2025, Balatro introduced a handful of Dead by Daylight-themed cards for its Friends of Jimbo 4 update. Now, almost one year later, the madness of Balatro is invading Dead by Daylight for a second crossover collaboration.Behaviour Interactive announced the upcoming Dead by Daylight x Balatro collab during a livestream about its current Stranger Things crossover. The new collaboration will give The Unknown--one of the first original killers in Dead by Daylight--a makeover inspired by Balatro's Madness Joker. articles.title_tr: Fable Reboot Is "Just Mind-Blowing," Microsoft Boss Says
articles.summary: One of the big reveals from the recent Xbox Developer Direct was the first gameplay showcase for the Fable reboot, and now a top Microsoft boss has further hyped it up. Craig Duncan, the head of Xbox Game Studios, said in an interview that the Fable reboot is coming together well, specifically singling out the game's so-called "Living Population" feature as being "mind-blowing.He said this to GamesRadar amid a response to a question about if he felt it was a "risk" for developer Playground to make an RPG after working exclusively on the Forza Horizon series since 2012. He said Playground working on Fable is "really about this relentless pursuit of excellence."Duncan said Playground made the Forza Horizon series "bigger and bigger" with each new installment, "But what does that mean for Fable?"Continue Reading at GameSpot
